summary: A new, stand-alone two-hander based on a well known Runescape weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][color=red][b]NEW! Scripted Version that Heals 100% of damage dealt at the cost of 30% stamina (SKSE Required)[/b][/color][/center]
[center][youtube]aCsZZUZ6EWQ[/youtube] [youtube]y0FTik3CYnE[/youtube] [youtube]x0llEN7DHhU[/youtube] [youtube]2fgWq0rSpIg[/youtube] [youtube]e3NW5E9PdE0[/youtube] [youtube]AsO_w4G58MA[/youtube] [youtube]uYJuxsSbe4E[/youtube][/center]
==========================================================

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eGpdzx8.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS![/b]

[b]About[/b]

The Saradomin Godsword is a weapon that first made it's appearance in Runescape. It was a popular weapon for leveling, being both efficient and powerful. It's initial design was to allow for 3 different melee styles; Slash, Stab and Crush.

I decided to create it for Skyrim because I felt the design could fit in well with the game and because I thought it would be fun to create a high quality two-handed sword that people might actually consider using. The Saradomin Godsword aims to be powerful and fun to use, making easy work of low level enemies whilst still holding it's own at later levels.

Both model and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â [b]A unique two-handed sword with a healing special effect.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Location[/b]

You will find the Saradomin Godsword at a shrine near Sundered Towers. The sword is in the arms of a Statue, surrounded by Nightshade. Behind there is a secret chest with Monk Robes for additional effect :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

sara_gs.esp
meshes/weapons/sara_gs
textures/weapons/sara_gs
textures/cubemaps/godsword.dds
Scripts/MEFAbsorbHealthSara.pex (SKSE Version Only)

[b]NOTE:[/b] There have been reports of the sword not showing up. Please remember to enable the .esp after you have installed the files :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:

sara_gs.esp
meshes/weapons/sara_gs
textures/weapons/sara_gs
textures/cubemaps/godsword.dds
Scripts/MEFAbsorbHealthSara.pex (SKSE Version Only)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. I've never played Runescape, what does the weapon do?
A. The Saradomin Godsword originally had a special attack that would heal the player. This Skyrim version heals the player on a successful hit.

Q. Isn't that really overpowered?
A. I've done extensive testing with different values and settled on the current. The weapon isn't overly strong, nor is it game-breaking in terms of healing.

Q. Do you plan on creating the Zamorak, Bandos and Armadyl Godswords?
A. It is something I plan on doing, yes. However, I'd like to create an actual Godwars Dungeon in Skyrim and make the hilts obtainable that way, so that they aren't just handed over right away.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes:[/b]

The Saradomin Godsword cannot be upgraded or enchanted. It does however do hidden damage when absorbing health from an enemy.

DO NOT MIX AND MATCH FILES. OVERWRITE COMPLETELY.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]
Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
